ygData.subject: Re: Martyn, Go Go!
ygData.msgSnippet: Please take flames to direct emails.  Do not send them to mail list Thank you, Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
ygData.messageBody:
Please take flames to direct emails. Do not send them to mail list

Thank you,
Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server



>From: "Daniel Fung"<dfung@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Martyn, Go Go!
>Date: Mon, 15 Nov 1999 11:28:46 +0900
>
>
>Harmonic is just another living being that is born to be a judge. There's
>only one set of fix definition for ppl's preference and desire. Who are you
>to say the word "deserve" ? Dont be arrogant and learn to understand/accept
>other people's way of doing things. It's ok you think they dont deserve it
>( I do respect your own opinion) but putting it out in the news list and
>stepping on another ppl like you're high high above just because you dont
>do it, is over esteemed of yourself.
>Now that this message is doing the same thing like you did to Martyn. How
>do you feel? Understand it yet? no? get a Stein Maggok +15 INT.
>If you're opinion is not being constructive, keep it to yourself.
>
>Gorson
>Lvl 19 Bard - Fenin Ro
>
